note.p: This lesson covers basic use of the <mapref> element and the elements it contains. For the full specifications for each element, see the OASIS DITA Version 1.2 Standard.

step.cmd: Inside the <map> element, after the <title> element, add a <topicmeta> element and add content to it as shown in the following example:

stepxmp.pre: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE map PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DITA Map//EN" "map.dtd"> <map id="ducks"> <title>Ducks</title> <topicmeta></topicmeta> </map>
